oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NPChunks
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The NPChunks training corpus contains approximately 1,000 sentences, in a total of 24,243 tokens, selected randomly from the written part of the CINTIL corpus (Barreto et al, 2006). The CINTIL corpus is a linguistically interpreted corpus of Portuguese composed of 1 Million annotated tokens from both written (689,124 tokens) and spoken (502,622 tokens) registers (http://cintil.ul.pt/pt/).
